name: Talk Euclid
_source: s;Euclid;Lachesis's temple...{w} the world's greatest mathematicians supposedly study here.{w}{br}But all I see is a locked gate.
s;Simon;You were hoping to learn from them somehow?
s;Euclid;Of course!{w} Imagine... being able to calculate the flow of fortune, explain entropy...{w}{br}It would be a dream come true.
s;Simon;Are there no documents of their work?
s;Euclid;Only rumors, unfortunately.{w}{br}A shame their work is not guided by Pelopos's hand,{w} else they would have written brilliant treatises.
s;Simon;Well, maybe you can find something while we're here.{w}{br}Maybe one of Lachesis's cultists dropped their notes.
